name: By the Vine
description:
By the vine is a Christian-based Visual Novel that takes place in a mysterious world called Edonis. Inhabiting this world is a race called the Cloats, which hold different abilities based on their culture. They were placed under a curse that whenever they sin they become feral. Follow the lives of six young Cloats as they build up their farm and unlock the secrets of the world around them.

Features

  • Christ-centered themes
  • Fully Voiced.
  • Cute animals.
  • Linear story.
  • Whimsical world.
  • Unlockable side stories.
  • Relaxing soundtrack.
  • Wholesome Story

(Possible features)

  • Cooking
  • Animal interactions
